title: Support are the bane of the Earth.
body:
You literally can't regain any vestige of map control and comebacks are one-in-a-million because of it.

It's really not fair that you can be shut down because a Support managed to scrape up 2K G and you lost a lane because they go and destroy other lanes chances too and render everyones contribution negligible.

replies.body: What the fuck are you smoking, and where can i get some?
I dont understand this post..? is this a post to say 8GET RID OF SUPPORTS ARGHHHH* or is it *PLZ NERF ALL SUPPORT OMZZZZZZ* idk

They're just f*cking annoying.

Ward bots.
Heal bots.
CC bots.

Most uninteresting play-role in the game and their map dominance is incredible once your team has an advantage because they lose nothing out of roaming and warding and once they have you can do little to clear the wards safely and they can just go and re-ward being barely vulnerable to ganks and their whole lifestyle is toxic because they eliminate the concept of comebacks, late-game and control dragon far more effectively than they should.

O_0 This is some salty S**t, Supports fill the role of supporting the team why is that such a bad thing?, if an enemy sup can hold dragon or whatever the f**k your on about then your doing a shit job at the role you are playing

Lol wtf are you on about?
I really don't see the relation between the support role and lack of comebacks.
If anything support is probably more interesting that being the ADC. All the ADC has to do is wait for the support to CC and bam kill.

Ideally **both teams have supports**. If your support is shit at helping control dragon then too bad. 
I'm pretty sure the jungler is idealistically the player that should control dragon. Are you going to say junglers are the bane of League because they control dragon far more effectively than any other role?

I wouldn't see any difference if your same logic was applied to any other role.

both teams have a support so theres an equal chance of u getting a good one or bad one and so for the other team. chances are u made this post after the enemy had a good support and their team beat yours while your support was bad
